Package infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov

Class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov

  • java.lang.Object
    • infodynamics.measures.continuous.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
      • infodynamics.measures.continuous.kraskov.ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous, EmpiricalNullDistributionComputer
    public class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov
extends ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
    An Active Information Storage (AIS) calculator (implementing ActiveInfoStorageCalculator) which is affected using a Kraskov-Stoegbauer-Grassberger (KSG) Mutual Information (MI) calculator (MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov) to make the calculations.

    That is, this class implements an AIS calculator using the KSG nearest-neighbour approach. This is achieved by plugging in MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov as the calculator into the parent class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.

    Usage is as per the paradigm outlined for ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, with:

    • The constructor step is either a simple call to ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov(), or else specifies which KSG algorithm to implement via ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov(int) or ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorKraskov(String);
    • setProperty(String, String) allowing properties for MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov.setProperty(String, String) (except MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariate.PROP_TIME_DIFF and those of the super-class as outlined in ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String)), including auto-embedding properties.
    • Computed values are in nats, not bits!

    References:

    • J.T. Lizier, M. Prokopenko and A.Y. Zomaya, "Local measures of information storage in complex distributed computation", Information Sciences, vol. 208, pp. 39-54, 2012.
    • Ragwitz and Kantz, "Markov models from data by simple nonlinear time series predictors in delay embedding spaces", Physical Review E, vol 65, 056201 (2002).
    • J. Garland, R. G. James, E. Bradley, "Leveraging information storage to select forecast-optimal parameters for delay-coordinate reconstructions", Physical Review E, Vol. 93 (2016), 022221, doi:
    Author:
    Joseph Lizier (email, www)
    See Also:
    ActiveInfoStorageCalculator, ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo, MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov

      • initialise

        public void initialise​(int k,
                       int tau)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
        Initialise the calculator for (re-)use, with some parameters supplied here, and existing (or default) values of other parameters to be used.

        All child classes must call this routine on this as the super class once they have finished executing their specialised code for their ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.initialise() implementations.

        Specified by:
        initialise in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculator
        Overrides:
        initialise in class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
        Parameters:
        k - embedding length of past history vector
        tau - embedding delay of past history vector
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty​(java.lang.String propertyName,
                        java.lang.String propertyValue)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets properties for the TE calculator. New property values are not guaranteed to take effect until the next call to an initialise method.

        Valid property names, and what their values should represent, include:

        • PROP_KRASKOV_ALG_NUM -- which Kraskov algorithm number to use (1 or 2).
        • Any properties accepted by ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo.setProperty(String, String)
        • Or properties accepted by the underlying MutualInfoCalculatorMultiVariateKraskov.setProperty(String, String) implementation.

        Note: further properties may be defined by child classes.

        Unknown property values are ignored.

        Specified by:
        setProperty in interface ActiveInfoStorageCalculator
        Specified by:
        setProperty in interface InfoMeasureCalculatorContinuous
        Overrides:
        setProperty in class ActiveInfoStorageCalculatorViaMutualInfo
        Parameters:
        propertyName - name of the property
        propertyValue - value of the property.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is a problem with the supplied value).

        Get current property values for the calculator.
